metadata.title: Falcon Jewelry Real Natural Obsidian Ring, Handmade Ring, Sterling Silver Men Ring, black
features: CUSTOMIZE YOUR JEWELRY: You can customize the rings already in our lists in terms of gem type, pattern, material type, size, etc! OR, You can just send photos or 2D/3D sketches of your dream jewelry. We will discuss the details together and make your dream come true! Contact us to get more information and discuss your dream jewelry!

GORGEOUS GIFT BOX: Quality product in beautiful unique wooden gift box. It is an excellent gift for all occasions: birthday, anniversary, holidays, graduation, christmas, valentine's day, father's day, wedding, engagement, promise. Great gift for him or her.
HANDCRAFTED UNIQUE DESIGN: Our rings are 100 percent handmade and unique in design with embroidered motifs of the Byzantine period. Our rings are crafted in solid 925 Sterling Silver with 925 stamp.

CUSTOMER SERVICE: In terms of any help you need to return your product or have any questions regarding; ring size, shipping, the situation of the cargo, a problem with the item etc. do not hesitate to contact us.

ALL SIZES AVAILABLE: Our rings are available in all sizes from 5 to 16 including halfs and quarters. If you have doubts or questions about your ring size please send us a message. Available in size (US) ; 5 / 5.25 / 5.5 / 5.75 / 6 / 6.25 / 6.5 / 6.75 / 7 / 7.25 / 7.5 / 7.75 / 8 / 8.25 / 8.5 / 8.75 / 9 / 9.25 / 9.5 / 9.75 / 10 / 10.25 / 10.5 / 10.75 / 11 / 11.25 / 11.5 / 11.75 / 12 / 12.25 / 12.5 / 12.75 / 13 / 13.25 / 13.5 / 13.75 / 14 / 14.25 / 14.5 / 14.75 / 15 / 15.25 / 15.5 / 15.75 / 16
description: 925 Sterling Silver men ring, ethnic design, Unique Handmade Silver Ring. Please let me know your ring size information after your order. Stone Size: 20-15 mm
